mapper.select: select count(username) from user_mst where username = #{username};
mapper.insert: insert into user_mst values( 0, #{username}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, now(), now() );

insert into user_mst values( 0, #{username}, #{password}, #{name}, #{telecom}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{birth_date}, #{gender}, #{email_assent}, #{sms_assent}, now(), now() );
select usercode from user_mst where username = #{username};
mapper.select: select count(username) from user_mst where username = #{username};
select password from user_mst where username = #{username};
